CustomField.formula: ( Annual_Rent__c - Annual_Total_Expenses__c ) / IF( Appraised_Value_Amount__c > 0, Appraised_Value_Amount__c, Borrower_Opinion_of_Current_Value__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: =c(Annual Rent - Annual Total Expenses) / Current Appraised As Is Value. If this field is blank, make sure Annual Total Expenses is NOT blank.
CustomField.label: Net Yield
